\pard\ltrpar\hyphpar0\qj\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\hyphpar0\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj\ulnone Section 1. Chapter 55 of the New York City charter is amended to add a new section 1206 to read as follows:\par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj\'a7\ul 1206. Projects relating to the public library systems.  No later than the first of December of each year, for projects managed by the department relating to the public library systems, the commissioner shall provide a report detailing the appropriation of funds in the previous fiscal year such projects.  Such report shall be in a searchable, sortable format and shall include the following information, disaggregated by each project:\par
a. the name of the contractor, and subcontractor if known;\par
b. a detailed description of project, including, but not limited to, the physical address, \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj block and lot numbers, estimated dates of start and completion; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj c. scope or purpose of the project; \par
d. original project cost;\par
e. revised project cost, if applicable;\par
f. of the total amount originally appropriated for a project, the total expenditure of funds, \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj disaggregated by fiscal year; and \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj g. services or materials purchased with such expenditure of funds, if known. \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj\ulnone\'a7 2. This local law shall take effect immediately. \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj\ul\par
